column2: an A.M. Eatery////My first time here
column3: the wait was an hour long. I suppose because they "close" at 2:30
column4: it's prime time at every time - at least on weekends. But luckily
column5: there are coffee shops - Southside Espresso
column7: Einstein's - in the area to wait at until you get that magical text - "your table is ready!"
